max-width-1col.description: The maximum page width for LANDING pages or 1 column pages

max.description:
The top & bottom padding of each section. The right and left paddings are 0.
Also apllies to the Hero panel as top, right, bottom and left paddings

min.description:
The top & bottom padding of each section. The right and left paddings are 0.
Also apllies to the Hero panel as top, right, bottom and left paddings
